text: Darlene Cates (Rita Darlene Guthrie; December 13, 1947 â€“ March 26, 2017) was an American actress. She played the obese housebound mother in the 1993 movie What's Eating Gilbert Grape. Cates died of a heart attack on March 26, 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Dallas
